formDescription: Please complete all sections of this application form accurately.

steps.title: Address Information
steps.description: Where do you live and where have you lived?

steps.title: Employment & Education
steps.description: Tell us about your professional and educational background

steps.title: Address Information
steps.description: Where do you live and where have you lived?

steps.title: Additional Information
steps.description: Other details that help us understand your application

fields.name: personName
fields.label: Full Name
fields.description: Enter your full legal name as shown on government ID
fields.helperText: Your name will appear on all official documents

validations.message: Name is required
Name must be at least 2 characters long
Name must be under 100 characters
Name can only contain letters and spaces

fields.name: expectedSalary
fields.label: Expected Salary (Monthly)
fields.description: Specify your monthly expected salary in your preferred currency
fields.helperText: Please provide your expected salary per month

validations.message: Salary is required
Salary must be at least ₹1000
Salary should not exceed ₹10,00,000
Salary must be at least 2 characters long
Salary must be under 100 characters

fields.name: professionalSummary
fields.label: Professional Summary
fields.description: Give a brief overview of your professional background.
fields.helperText: Include your work experience, roles, or major achievements.

validations.message: Professional summary is required
Summary must be at least 20 characters long
Summary must be under 500 characters
Only letters, numbers, and basic punctuation allowed

sections.title: Address Information
sections.description: Enter your residential and mailing addresses

fields.name: zipCode
fields.label: ZIP Code
fields.description: Enter your 5-digit ZIP code.
fields.helperText: Please provide a valid ZIP code for your area.

validations.message: ZIP Code is required
ZIP Code must be at least 5 digits
ZIP Code must not exceed 5 digits
Must be greaterThan 3 characters
Must be lessThan 50 characters
ZIP Code must be a 5-digit number

fields.name: isPrimaryResidence
fields.label: Is this your primary residence?
fields.description: Indicate whether the address you provided is your primary place of residence.
fields.helperText: Check this if this is your current living address.

validations.message: Please confirm if this is your primary residence.

fields.name: sameAsMailingAddress
fields.label: Same as Mailing Address
fields.description: Check this box if your residential address is the same as your mailing address
fields.helperText: Selecting this will automatically copy your mailing address details

validations.message: Please indicate if this is the same as your mailing address
At least one option must be selected

fields.name: phoneNumber
fields.label: Phone Number
fields.description: Please enter your primary contact number
fields.helperText: Include country code and area code

validations.message: Phone number is required
Phone number must be at least 10 digits
Phone number cannot exceed 15 digits
Please enter a valid phone number
Please enter a valid international phone number

fields.title: Address History
fields.description: Add your Additional address, starting with the most recent

fields.name: zipCode
fields.label: ZIP Code
fields.description: Enter your 5-digit ZIP code.
fields.helperText: Please provide a valid ZIP code for your area.

validations.message: ZIP Code is required
ZIP Code must be at least 5 digits
ZIP Code must not exceed 5 digits
ZIP Code must be a 5-digit number

fields.name: isPrimaryResidence
fields.label: Is this your primary residence?
fields.description: Indicate whether the address you provided is your primary place of residence.
fields.helperText: Check this if this is your current living address.

validations.message: Please confirm if this is your primary residence.

fields.name: sameAsMailingAddress
fields.label: Same as Mailing Address
fields.description: Check this box if your residential address is the same as your mailing address
fields.helperText: Selecting this will automatically copy your mailing address details

validations.message: Please indicate if this is the same as your mailing address
At least one option must be selected

fields.name: degreeLevel
fields.label: Highest Degree Level
fields.description: Select your highest completed education level
fields.helperText: Choose the highest degree you have completed or are currently pursuing

validations.message: Please select your degree level
Please select minimum 1
select max 3 degree level

fields.name: companySelection
fields.label: Select Company
fields.description: Search and select your company
fields.helperText: Type at least 2 characters to search for companies

validations.message: Please select a company
You can select up to 5 companies
You can select up to 1 companies

fields.name: teamMembers
fields.label: Select Team Members
fields.description: Select team members for the project
fields.helperText: You can select up to 5 team members. Search by name or email.

validations.message: Please select at least one team member
At least one team member must be selected
You cannot select more than 5 team members

fields.name: appointmentTime
fields.label: Preferred Time
fields.description: Select your preferred appointment time
fields.helperText: Business hours are from 09:00 to 17:00

validations.message: Please select an appointment time
Appointments start from 09:00
Last appointment must be before 17:00

fields.name: appointmentDateTime
fields.label: Appointment Date & Time
fields.description: Select your preferred appointment date and time
fields.helperText: Appointments available Monday-Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM

validations.message: Appointment date and time is required
Appointments must be scheduled at least 24 hours in advance
Appointments cannot be scheduled more than 1 year in advance
Appointments start from 9:00 AM
Last appointment must be before 5:00 PM

fields.name: vacationPeriod
fields.label: Vacation Period
fields.description: Select your vacation start and end dates
fields.helperText: Vacation period must be between 1 and 30 days

validations.message: Please select both start and end dates
Vacation cannot start before January 15, 2024
Vacation must start before December 31, 2024
Minimum vacation duration is 1 day
Maximum vacation duration is 30 days

fields.name: skillsSelection
fields.label: Professional Skills
fields.description: Select all skills that apply to your profile
fields.helperText: Select at least 2 skills but no more than 5 skills that best represent your expertise

validations.message: Please select at least one skill
Please select at least 2 skills
You can select up to 5 skills maximum

options.label: Cloud Computing
options.description: AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud platforms

fields.name: profileImage
fields.label: Profile Image
fields.description: Upload or select a professional profile photo
fields.helperText: Image must be JPEG/PNG, max 5MB, minimum 300x300px

validations.message: Profile image is required

fields.name: educationLevel
fields.label: Education Level
fields.description: Select your highest level of education completed
fields.helperText: Choose the option that best represents your educational qualification

validations.message: This is required.

fields.name: contactEmail
fields.label: Contact Email
fields.description: Enter your business email address
fields.helperText: We will send important notifications to this email address

validations.message: Business email address is required
Email must be at least 5 characters long
Email must be under 100 characters
Please enter a valid email address format

fields.name: userPassword
fields.label: Create Password
fields.description: Create a strong password for your account
fields.helperText: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, number and special character

validations.message: Password is required
Password must be at least 8 characters long
Password must not exceed 32 characters
Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character

fields.name: birthDate
fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.description: Please enter your date of birth
fields.helperText: You must be at least 18 years old to register

validations.message: Date of birth is required
Please enter a valid date of birth
Date cannot be in the future

fields.name: salaryRange
fields.label: Expected Salary Range
fields.description: Select your expected annual salary range in USD
fields.helperText: Drag the slider to set your expected salary range

validations.message: Please select your expected salary range

fields.name: sessionToken
fields.label: Session Token
fields.description: Stores session authentication token

validations.message: System token is required
Invalid token format

fields.name: websiteUrl
fields.label: Website URL
fields.description: Enter your website or portfolio URL
fields.helperText: Enter a valid URL including https:// or http://

validations.message: Website URL is required
Invalid URL format
URL must be at least 10 characters long
URL is too long (maximum 2048 characters)

fields.name: fileUpload
fields.label: File Upload
fields.description: Upload your documents in PDF, JPG, or PNG format
fields.placeholder: Drop files here or click to upload
fields.helperText: Maximum file size: 5MB. Allowed formats: PDF, JPG, PNG

validations.message: Please upload at least one file
Invalid file type. Please upload PDF, JPG, or PNG files only
File size exceeds 5MB limit
Please select at least one file
